product_overview: A modern web application for a food ordering service featuring an interactive menu, responsive navigation, order processing, and location visualization.
core_goals: Provide an intuitive and responsive interface for browsing categorized menu items.
Enable smooth navigation and quick access to key sections on both desktop and mobile devices.
Allow users to easily add, update, and remove items in a persistent shopping cart.
Support order placement with user details and facilitate order submission via WhatsApp.
Display the physical store location on an interactive map for user convenience.
key_features: Responsive navigation bar with mobile toggle and smooth scrolling functionality.
Categorized menu display with filtering, detailed view modals, and add-to-cart functionality.
Shopping cart management with state persistence using local storage.
Pre-order processing including user details form and WhatsApp message generation for order submission.
Interactive store location map implemented using React Leaflet.
Reusable UI components such as buttons, floating images, and social media links for consistent design.
user_flow_summary: Users enter the site and navigate through sections via the responsive navigation bar on desktop or mobile.
Users browse menu categories, view item details, and add desired items to the shopping cart.
Users review their cart contents using a floating order button, adjust quantities or remove items as needed.
Upon checkout, users fill out order details in the pre-order modal form and submit the order, which is sent through WhatsApp.
Users can view the store location on the interactive map embedded in the location section.
validation_criteria: Navigation bar is fully responsive and supports smooth scrolling and toggle on mobile devices.
Menu items properly categorized, filterable, and detailed views open correctly with add-to-cart functions working.
Shopping cart state persists correctly across sessions and allows item modification.
Pre-order modal validates user input and successfully generates a WhatsApp message for order submission.
Store location map loads correctly and is interactive with correct placement shown on the map.
UI components render consistently across major browsers and screen sizes.
